name: Forward (itch) (ItsKazBorn, Sychro)
description: Sometimes self care means tidying up your room. To some people with depression, without the energy to even get out of bed, your room starts to reflect your mental state. Forward is a notgame about fighting depression with little actions, like tidying your own room. It isn't something that will cure depression, but it's through small changes that fighting the illness becomes possible and you can start to feel at home again.
